short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to of Remember it. Select text and save it anytime immediately.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After install, user can select text and save it to Remember It from context menu. Then user can see all the text in the website https://rememberit.oscarjiang.site.
In the future, it can auto translate, add comment and manage todos base on the selection.

User needs to signup with their google account to use.
